ygData.subject: Re: Buying and Selling Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You did used to lose songs if you died.  I have heard that as long as the song is in a backpack or other container, it will not disappear, but the rumour I
ygData.messageBody:
Tony Butler wrote:
>
> From: "Tony Butler" <tbutler@...>
>
> That is correct. I often will buy several songs ahead and drop them in my
> bankbox.
>
> When I told one person this, I was warned that if I were to die, I'd loose
> my songs. Wrong. Believe me, I'd be out lots of pp by now. You don't
> loose songs, either in bank or in your backpack, when you die.
>

You did used to lose songs if you died. I have heard that as long as
the song is in a backpack or other container, it will not disappear, but
the rumour I heard is that if it is in the base level of your inventory,
it will still disappear.

Jyzan
